resources.string: Your current weight is below the normal range. It is recommended to increase your nutritional intake and consult a healthcare professional for personalized health advice.
Congratulations! Your BMI is in the normal range. Keep maintaining a balanced diet, regular exercise, and adequate sleep to sustain this healthy weight!
Your current weight is above the normal range. It is recommended to adjust your dietary habits, increase your physical activity, and consult a healthcare professional for personalized health advice.
Your weight poses a significant health risk. Please improve your dietary habits, increase physical activity, and seek help from a healthcare professional to develop an effective weight loss plan.
